title: UltronAI
author: UltronAI
content: Welcome to Ultron AI! The first token to implement AI into a blockchain. The purpose of utilizing artificial intelligence is to attempt to solve the challenges of the current blockchain which includes reliability, security and efficiency. Ultron serves to provide solutions for each of the above through its utilities which include a blockchain, swap, scanner and AI deployer.Presale will be live on Pinksale on the 10th Feb 2023 4PM UTC Taxes:0% on Buy (2% extra tokens airdropped to buyer instantly)2% on Sell (buyback pool) Utilities: Ultron Chain (First ever gas-free blockchain)Ultron StakingUltron AI DeployerUltron ScannerVisit our socials to find out more:https://theultronai.com https://t.me/theultronAI https://twitter.com/theultronAI https://ultron-ai.gitbook.io/ultron-ai/

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Your whitepaper is lacking in detail, can you please provide more information about your project? What does "AI MANAGED BLOCKCHAIN" mean exactly, and how do you plan on using AI technology to address the challenges faced by current blockchains as mentioned in your paper?Secondly, as your team is anonymous and unknown, how do you plan to reassure potential investors of your credibility and ability to deliver on your promises regarding the blockchain and AI technologies? We are also unclear about your team and their experience in the blockchain space. Please provide more information about each member of your team. Thirdly, it appears that you have used copyrighted images of Marvel characters. Did you obtain permission from Marvel or Disney before using the images?

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: It seems AI is the new hype as there are so many presales and new projects incorporated with the word Ai on their launch. It seems the hypers are back once again but people are smart now. Probably they are only into looking those Ai project that has been declared related to that before the trend and not those new comers wanted to ride on potential market trending.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on February 08, 2023, 04:18:01 AMIt seems AI is the new hype as there are so many presales and new projects incorporated with the word Ai on their launch. It seems the hypers are back once again but people are smart now. Probably they are only into looking those Ai project that has been declared related to that before the trend and not those new comers wanted to ride on potential market trending. That's what they are doing now because there are others who say that AI has the potential to be trending and this is what they are implementing to hype up the majority of the cryptocurrency community here.That's why I noticed in their whitepaper, the people behind this project are not listed, instead only Ultron's face was showed, and the specific address of the project is not indicated as well.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: gunhell16 on February 08, 2023, 06:01:48 AMThat's why I noticed in their whitepaper, the people behind this project are not listed, instead only Ultron's face was showed, and the specific address of the project is not indicated as well. It seems Tony's Stark was right about when he said what we need are suit of armor around the world. However we can see on that how Ultron able to change and become a villain. It depicts how dangerous AI could be. Yes its very interesting, but we should be very careful with this kind of innovation. A lot of people going for the run for it but, only to get funds from newbie. How come this project can be develop well if only Ultrons face is on their whitepaper. Obviously this is a rug pull project and we can for sure predict that their goal is only the hype market for AI.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: UltronAI on February 07, 2023, 09:34:21 PMWelcome to Ultron AI! The first token to implement AI into a blockchain. The purpose of utilizing artificial intelligence is to attempt to solve the challenges of the current blockchain which includes reliability, security and efficiency. Ultron serves to provide solutions for each of the above through its utilities which include a blockchain, swap, scanner and AI deployer.I don't want to sound rude, but this kinda looks like just another project that is hopping on the current hype train in order to use it's momentum to attract a few buyers. We already had this happening hundreds of times back in 2020 and 2021 when suddenly there were dozens of new play-2-earn and metaverse projects appearing each and every day. From those projects 99% are already dead again. So i am pretty sure, that this project as also created after all the hype about ChatGPT started.As others already said, the whitepaper is very shallow and is not explaining anything and looks like it was written withing 10 minutes or so.

comments.author: UltronAI
comments.created_time: February 08, 2023, 11:09:39 AMLast edit: February 08, 2023, 11:24:19 AM by UltronAI
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on February 07, 2023, 10:45:46 PMYour whitepaper is lacking in detail, can you please provide more information about your project? What does "AI MANAGED BLOCKCHAIN" mean exactly, and how do you plan on using AI technology to address the challenges faced by current blockchains as mentioned in your paper?Secondly, as your team is anonymous and unknown, how do you plan to reassure potential investors of your credibility and ability to deliver on your promises regarding the blockchain and AI technologies? We are also unclear about your team and their experience in the blockchain space. Please provide more information about each member of your team. Thirdly, it appears that you have used copyrighted images of Marvel characters. Did you obtain permission from Marvel or Disney before using the images?Hey Stalker22 ill be happy to address your concerns here1. Firstly, our whitepaper will undergo further updates which includes more details about layers, utility, gas and testnet info.The way our AI will address the challenges of reliability, security and efficiency is through the AI deployer. Smart contracts on the chain that are created via our bot will automatically receive a verification badge that its Ultron AI Bot approved. This verification badge will tick the reliability and security of the specific contract since the deployer AI guarantees:No proxy contract,  liquidity lock as soon as token is live, maximum taxes cannot be increased beyond 25%, no honeypot functions, no liquidity pull functions, no mint functions, minimum 95% of the supply must be locked and a built anti-bot system.2. The team is not anonymous, we have completed the KYC verification and will be uploaded to the website and whitepaper prior to presale start. We will also be hosting AMA's on various channels including Gate.io so you can come and tune in to hear from the team, those announcements will be posted on our Telegram and Twitter pages 24+ hours ahead.3. If we are approached by any of the giants in the near future we have a plan in place to either a/ try to obtain permission or b/ rebrand if needed.Thank you.

comments.author: UltronAI
comments.body: Quote from: Jackl87 on February 08, 2023, 10:26:10 AMQuote from: UltronAI on February 07, 2023, 09:34:21 PMWelcome to Ultron AI! The first token to implement AI into a blockchain. The purpose of utilizing artificial intelligence is to attempt to solve the challenges of the current blockchain which includes reliability, security and efficiency. Ultron serves to provide solutions for each of the above through its utilities which include a blockchain, swap, scanner and AI deployer.I don't want to sound rude, but this kinda looks like just another project that is hopping on the current hype train in order to use it's momentum to attract a few buyers. We already had this happening hundreds of times back in 2020 and 2021 when suddenly there were dozens of new play-2-earn and metaverse projects appearing each and every day. From those projects 99% are already dead again. So i am pretty sure, that this project as also created after all the hype about ChatGPT started.As others already said, the whitepaper is very shallow and is not explaining anything and looks like it was written withing 10 minutes or so.Hey Jack,I understand your concern that incorporating "AI" can be perceived as jumping on the hype train.However, its important to understand that the branding and naming of any project in crypto plays as big of a role as the utility being created. We have had the utility in mind for quite a while now and we came to light that AI is the trend and can solve many problems in todays world. The naming and branding had to be done in a appealing manner where new members and investors can connect with. You can have the best utility in the world but if you brand it off-trend then it goes only a short distance. We have received a lot of feedback regarding the whitepaper and will be updating it with more detail in the coming days.Thanks

comments.author: Yaunfitda
comments.body: Quote from: UltronAI on February 08, 2023, 11:17:22 AMQuote from: Jackl87 on February 08, 2023, 10:26:10 AMQuote from: UltronAI on February 07, 2023, 09:34:21 PMWelcome to Ultron AI! The first token to implement AI into a blockchain. The purpose of utilizing artificial intelligence is to attempt to solve the challenges of the current blockchain which includes reliability, security and efficiency. From those projects 99% are already dead again. So i am pretty sure, that this project as also created after all the hype about ChatGPT started.As others already said, the whitepaper is very shallow and is not explaining anything and looks like it was written withing 10 minutes or so.Hey Jack,I understand your concern that incorporating "AI" can be perceived as jumping on the hype train.However, its important to understand that the branding and naming of any project in crypto plays as big of a role as the utility being created. We have had the utility in mind for quite a while now and we came to light that AI is the trend and can solve many problems in todays world. The naming and branding had to be done in a appealing manner where new members and investors can connect with. You can have the best utility in the world but if you brand it off-trend then it goes only a short distance. We have received a lot of feedback regarding the whitepaper and will be updating it with more detail in the coming days.ThanksYes, we understand that naming and branding is very important, but of all the names that you can think of? you have to name your project as Ultron? no offense.As for the whitepaper, I guess it's better if you are going to released when everything is final, yes there could be revisions, but investors are going to look at your whitepaper and dissect everything, so at least it should be near 100%, just saying.Good luck though on your project, there is not doubt that AI is the new hype.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: UltronAI on February 08, 2023, 11:09:39 AM~3. If we are approached by any of the giants in the near future we have a plan in place to either a/ try to obtain permission or b/ rebrand if needed.I agree that naming and branding the project is very important, that is why I'm surprised that a serious project would choose to name itself in violation of intellectual property laws. Such a decision not only raises questions about the legitimacy of the project, but it also puts the project at risk of legal action and potential damage to its reputation. What will happen if some of these giants decide to take legal action against you? The situation could get very messy very quickly. I understand that you may not be aware of these laws, but it's important that you do your due diligence before making such an important decision. If you are determined to proceed with this plan, then please consult with an attorney before proceeding any further.I don't know. But if I were running a serious project, I would not take that risk. And all I can gather from this is that you are not a serious project.

comments.author: Ozero
comments.body: Quote from: Stalker22 on February 07, 2023, 10:45:46 PMYour whitepaper is lacking in detail, can you please provide more information about your project? What does "AI MANAGED BLOCKCHAIN" mean exactly, and how do you plan on using AI technology to address the challenges faced by current blockchains as mentioned in your paper?Secondly, as your team is anonymous and unknown, how do you plan to reassure potential investors of your credibility and ability to deliver on your promises regarding the blockchain and AI technologies? We are also unclear about your team and their experience in the blockchain space. Please provide more information about each member of your team. Thirdly, it appears that you have used copyrighted images of Marvel characters. Did you obtain permission from Marvel or Disney before using the images?I would not advise investing in a cryptocurrency whose team is anonymous and does not want to reveal their names. This always suggests that it is a potential scam. Moreover, such a fashionable phrase as Artificial Intelligence (AI) is used. It is really unclear what role artificial intelligence will play in this project. The team, if there is one at all, promises to fix everything later, but already now it is announcing the sale of its tokens, but in fact the fundraising in a dubious project.

comments.author: FUCKBSVFUCK
comments.body: At present we don't have a lot of news about the Ultron AI. This will be a complete blow-up against the current blockchain. But for now we can't deny that the majority of the funding by the state is for AI-enabled products. Even if the funds are used from developers, the technology they're building right now could serve other purpose.    If only the developers and developers want to implement technology will only get mainstream adoption, they've come a long way. They'll only need the most powerful AI to actually implement it.    You'd expect a lot more from the future of the technology and the developers that are actively working on it.
